events.name: Video: Winning The Worst Perilous Spawn - Zorakwar vs Vedmedik (Map 1)
events.details: Map 1 from the Grand Final of the Diabotical Test Tournament Series NA Duel, one of the most anticipated matchups of 2020! Zorak and Ved have a great clash of styles, and this map is a great showcase of both player's strengths.

events.name: Factory Diabotical Duel Masters
events.details: Factory Esports is hosting another LAN duel tournament with $10k USD of prizes! The 16 player pool includes Agent, Cypher, Pavel, Danchez and more. Haymo and I will be covering the first 4 hours of games on the English stream.

events.name: Video: The Sneakiest Red Armour Frag on Bioplant (Diabotical Community Duel Cast)
events.details: Kejtos sent me a replay to review. This guy takes insane risks with the PNCR but hits crazy shots to compensate. This is an action packed map with some weird situations, but lots of lessons to take away.

events.name: Video: Waiting For The Frags - Zorakwar vs Vedmedik (Map 2)
events.details: Map 2 of the Diabotical Test Tournament Series, NA Duel Grand Final. Zoarkwar and Vedmedik on Skybreak, one of the smaller, faster maps in the game but struggle to find frags. Lots of back and forward, a very intense game and a great showcase of clashing styles.

events.name: Video: How to Fight on Raya (Backsteen vs Karwik, Diabotical Duel)
events.details: A recent grand final map between two very different players. Raya has some amazing spaces to fight in, and these players give a masterclass on how to stage some excellent combat.
